thumb.title: Sennzai - アスター (Music Video)
thumb.description: VocaDuo2025 参加作品 ✦Streaming / DL BOOTH Bandcamp coming soon... ✦Team:『わくわく保育園』Vocal：Sennzai Music：Mogaki https://x.com/mogakixx Lyrics：威戸れもね。 https://x.com/Le_Citr0nArrange/Mix：みちる https://x.com/michikirin Guitar：Sebon https://x.com/Sebon3254 Illust：梅之シイ https://x.com/umeoisii6 Movie：mrhc https://x.com/8_mrhc 3DCG ：菊之介 https://x.com/812Veill GraphicDesign：ふたもく https://x.com/FutaMoku_1548┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈ X（Twitter）：@sennzai https://twitter.com/sennzai Instagram：@sennzai https://www.instagram.com/sennzai/ HP https://www.sennzai.com/ FANBOX（Support） https://sennzai.fanbox.cc/ BOOTH（Goods） https://seardrop.booth.pm/ Spotify https://open.spotify.com/artist/5u7XHknHLC0V9liKGr2I9d Other https://lit.link/sennzai 💌【お仕事のご依頼・お問い合わせはこちら】 sennzai3@yahoo.co.jp
